responses: Hello, thanks for visiting
Good to see you again
Hi, how can I help?
Wish u the same, Do u need any assistance?

patterns: When food would be available in canteen?
For how many hours your canteen is available?
What all would be available in canteen?
responses: The canteen is located to the left side of entrance. Timings are from 9:00 a.m to 6:00 p.m. Breakfast, Lunch , Snacks and Tea are available

patterns: How can I go to apex block?
responses: The apex block is behind the statue of Ramaiah

patterns: How can I reach CSE block?
Can u please guide me to CSE block?
responses: CSE is located in the main block, First floor?

patterns: Can u please guide me to Hi-Tech Seminar Hall?
responses: Hi tech Seminar Hall is at Ground zero, below CSE

patterns: Please guide me to Principal's Office?
responses: It is in ground zero in the main building

patterns: How can I reach MCA Departmen?
responses: MCA department is in level 3 of apex block

patterns: Can you please help me in the Admission of my son?
responses: It is in ground zero in the main building
It is in ground zero in the main building, next to Administration

patterns: Whether payment is offline or online?
what are the modes of payment available
responses: It is online payments. More information is available in our website www.msrit.edu

patterns: How many Library blocks are available?
What are the timings of Library?
responses: Three units of Library are available. One is located in Main building and other two are in Apex block. It is available between 8:00 a.m to 8:00 p.m
We're open every day from 9am-4pm
Our hours are 9am-4pm every day

patterns: When r u closed in a week?
Are u open on all six days?
Are u working on Saturday or Sunday?
Do u work on Religious holidays?
responses: We are closed on Sunday and National Holidays. All other days we work
We are closed on Religious holidays as declared by State Government

patterns: Do you have grounds to encourage sports?
responses: We encourage sports. We have indoor ground for badminton and TT. We have outdoor ground too

patterns: Apart from CET and Comed-K, any other seats are available?
responses: Apart from CET and Comed-K, Management seats are available. Pl check our website www.msrit.edu for more information.

patterns: What courses are available in RIT?
Can I get information about courses?
responses: CSE, E&E, E&C, Mechanical, AI are available. Pl check our website www.msrit.edu for more information.

patterns: How can I reach Examination Cell?
responses: Examination cell is in level 2 of Main block

patterns: Can you please brief about the Hostel Facility?
responses: We have separate Hostel facility for boys and girls.Pl check our website www.msrit.edu for more information?

patterns: How can I reach the teaching staff?
responses: Teaching staff is placed in the staff room in main block
It is celebrated during the November of every year.

patterns: Where I can park my vehicle?
responses: It is in the zeroth floor below canteen

patterns: How can I reach Maths Department?
responses: It is in the 7th floor of main building

patterns: How can I reach Physics Department?
responses: It is in the 2nd floor of main building

patterns: How can I reach Chemisty Department?
responses: It is in the 2nd floor of main building

patterns: How can I reach Mechanical Department?
responses: It is in the 2nd floor of Apex building

patterns: How can I reach Electronics Department?
responses: It is to the right of the Entrance in main building

patterns: How can I reach Electrical Department?
responses: It is to the left of the Entrance in main building

patterns: How can I get the feedback about college?
How do I get more information on RIT?
responses: Please check in FAQ section of our website www.msrit.edu
We are not open only on Sundays or government holidays
